column4: Hi guys. Any known issues installing Ubuntu on a Thinkpad T41 ? After the initial progress-bar/ubuntu logo, and a delay, I'm left with a flashing textmode cursor in the top left of the screen.
oh, and I can see "Calling INT 0x15 (F000:66EB) <cr> EAC is 0x5F08" on tty1, repeated about five times.
